content:
madelyn Kidd

Madelyn Kidd News EditorMarch  

Eastern strongly encourages students and faculty to take a COVID19 SHIELD test when classes return to session after Spring Break PERIOD

In an email sent out earlier today Eastern requests everyone to take an oncampus SHIELD test once they return to campus PERIOD Eastern sent out a similar email before everyone returned to campus for the spring semester as well PERIOD The retesting test days are set for March  to March  PERIOD

Unvaccinated students faculty or staff are required to take a SHIELD test upon returning from break PERIOD

Eastern states the encouraged retesting for fully vaccinated students faculty or staff includes anyone learning living working or participating in any oncampus activities. eastern requests both those required to be tested and those encouraged to get retested as early as possible PERIOD

Eastern also recommends setting up an appointment prior to make the SHIELD testing process run smoother and faster PERIOD Appointments can be made on the SHIELD testing portal PERIOD

If you have tested positive for COVID19 within the last  days with a PCR test you are not required to take a reentry test PERIOD

If you have tested COVID19 positive but not submitted a positive PCR test yet you can submit the PCR test to Georgia Ryan for students at emailprotected and Linda Holloway for employees at emailprotected PERIOD

For those remaining oncampus during Spring Break and are required to test weekly the Spring Break SHIELD schedule is for March  from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD and March  from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD

Per Easterns current masking requirements everyone is required to wear a mask at the oncampus SHIELD testing location in the Student Recreation Center PERIOD





Madelyn Kidd can be reached at  or at emailprotected PERIOD

Madelyn Kidd is a senior public affairs reporting major PERIOD She previously served as EditorinChief of The Navigator at Lake Land College then managing editor.. PERIOD
